msbt.message: I read the whole letter you wrote. You sure poured your heart out onto the page! Do you do that for everyone you write to, or just me? Either way, it moved me enough to get you a little something!

Thanks for the rocking message! Your intense letter-writing spirit hit me right here. (I just pointed at my heart.) I'm sending you a thing to show my appreciation. I dunno if you'll like it, but it's yours now!

I read your whole letter, front to back! I can't believe you went to all that trouble just for me. One good turn deserves another, so here's my best shot at a letter— with a present to sweeten the pot!

Thanks for the loooooooong letter. Hope your hand's OK after writing all that! You need it for important stuff like pulling weeds, or fixing bikes, or arm wrestling. If any of that sounds fun to you, hit me up!
Seeing your letter in my mailbox made my entire day! Then when I saw how much you wrote, it made my whole WEEK! It was a good read too. All the words were spelled right and such. (I assume?)
That was a real strong letter you sent. It felt like I was really there listening to you talk. Which was weird, 'cause I wasn't saying anything back, you know? So that's what this is. See you around!
